attributes.action: Add traffic light and speed bumps to school roads
attributes.additional_details: Somebody got hit and they are only 11 yrs old stating secondary school. We need to stop this from happening.
attributes.background: Add patrol people and police around school areas as people are getting hurt.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on roads and traffic measures are for local councils. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
